title: Mettaton NEO

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player to block their path. If they would have killed anyone besides you or themselves, their attack will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot be given protective effects. All protective effects applied to you will secretly fail.
- You cannot gain permanent defense, but your defense cannot go any lower either.
- ||Yes, the flavor text is a quote from Spamton, not Mettaton, but it's still fitting.||

desc:
Post 3456
*DIDN'T YOU KNOW [Neo] IS FAMOUS FOR ITS HIGH DEFENSE!?*
